TextView.android:text: A mobile application, with two kinds of users, one - a person who searches for disaster survivors; two - those people who are in need of any kind of help. This application uses wifi direct for the people to connect with each other so that the searching user is aware that there are users in need of help within the area. The searching user will be able to find the person and rescue him. In case the user is trapped and is not seen easily, a feature in the mobile application can be used. This feature includes flashlight and production of sound which will be very helpful in finding and indicating the location of the trapped person.
